医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
俄克拉荷马州儿童医院改善了针对新生儿戒酒综合征的婴儿的护理在过去的几年中，卫生保健提供者对妇女采取了惩罚性立场，以孕育暴露于子宫中阿片类药物等物质的婴儿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/oklahoma-childrens-hospital-hospital-improves-care-for-babies-with-neonatal-neonatal-abstinence-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/oklahoma-childrens-hospital-mospital-improves-care-for-babies-with-neonatal-abstal-abstinence-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94cb29E9-A4FF-4829-95E2-768DE57D8EDE Wed, 09 Apr 2025 21:33:29 -0400 Oklahoma Children's Hospital improves care for babies with neonatal abstinence syndrome
UCLA研究识别关键蛋白驱动肾脏疤痕使用小鼠模型和人类遗传数据进行的新的UCLA研究发现了一个关键因素，该因素决定了肾脏损伤后发生了多少疤痕，导致科学家确定了一种潜在的精确药物方法来防止慢性肾脏疾病进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/ucla-study-indistifies-key-protein-driving-kidney-scarring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/ucla-study-indistifies-key-protein-driving-kidney-scarring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B73AD897-B37E-4008-93E9-70229CE1C186 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 21:26:42 -0400 UCLA study identifies key protein driving kidney scarring
与帕金森氏症有关的蛋白质也发现了黑色素瘤的生长由俄勒冈州健康与科学大学领导的新研究发现，导致帕金森氏病的神经退行性涉及的小蛋白质也驱动了一种称为黑色素瘤的皮肤癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/protein-linked-to-parkinsons-also-found-found-to-drive-melanoma growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/protein-linked-to-parkinsons-also-found-found-to-drive-to-drive-melanoma growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d901720-9E03-44B9-906E-9CCCCCC19F2C8ED Wed, 09 Apr 2025 21:22:22 -0400 Protein linked to Parkinson's also found to drive melanoma growth
心理健康障碍在犯罪法律历史的人中更普遍一项新的国家流行病学调查提供了一个人口统计学和诊断的情况，表明在监狱中患有精神疾病的人，去年有刑事法律参与的人，以及那些在去年没有犯罪法律历史的人，在被监禁的个人和最近有犯罪法律历史的人中，五个精神健康状况的率高得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/mental-health-disorders-more-prevalent-in-people-inpeople-with-criminal-legal-histories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/mental-health-disorders-more-prevalent-in-people-in-people-with-criminal-legal-histories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c5D410f-4E31-402F-B863-18F31CFD3E1D Wed, 09 Apr 2025 21:18:57 -0400 Mental health disorders more prevalent in people with criminal legal histories
高纤维饮食有助于防止危险的肠道感染巴西和美国研究人员发表在《细胞宿主和微生物》杂志上的一项研究表明，富含可溶性纤维的饮食可以保护肠子免受致病性细菌的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/high-fiber-fiber-diet-helps-protect-against-danger-gut-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/high-fiber-fiber-diet-helps-protect-against-danger-gut-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b66666666d-412d-47f6-957A-324CD028CE1A Wed, 09 Apr 2025 21:15:00 -0400 High fiber diet helps protect against dangerous gut infections
图兰研究人员开发用于快速结核病诊断的便携式设备根据科学转化医学上发表的一项研究，杜兰大学的研究人员已经开发了一种首先的手持式诊断装置，可以在一个小时内进行快速，准确的结核病诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/tulane-researchers-develop-porvevice-portable-device-device-for-port-rapid-tb-diangnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/tulane-researchers-develop-develop-develop-device-device-device-for-devor-tb-diangnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce7D562E-2C20-4BEC-ABE2-DF584BC4710C Wed, 09 Apr 2025 21:04:41 -0400 Tulane researchers develop portable device for rapid TB diagnosis
大麻使用者的多巴胺水平升高麦吉尔大学领导的一项研究发现，大麻使用障碍（CUD）的人在与精神病相关的大脑区域中的多巴胺水平升高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/cannabis-users-have-eleved-dopamine-levels- serceciated-with-psychosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/cannabis-users-have-eleved-dopamine-levels-ebles-sectiation-with-psychosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4A30560C-7283-4CC6-B850-CBB3946D773E Wed, 09 Apr 2025 21:01:04 -0400 Cannabis users have elevated dopamine levels associated with psychosis
